text: Yazini into yokuba phakathi kwenu kukho uMthunywa ka- Allâh. Ukuba ngaba ebeza kuthobela nina ubukhulu becala, beniya kuba sebunzimeni, kodwa uAllâh Unibonelele ngokholo, Walwenza lwathandeka nasezintliziyweni zenu, Wenza kwathiyeka kuni ukungakholwa, indelelo, nokungabi nantobeko. Abo (banjalo) ngabona bakhokelelekileyo
